title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" Popup Action Enablement
description: Bug 10022 reports incorrect enablement behavior for the "Build" popup action.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even when a manual build is unnecessary.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu should be automatically disabled if a build is already completed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a project in the Java perspective.
2. Verify that the 'Build' action is always enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu, even when no manual build is required.
